title: Possible values of ans after three calls to RANDOM

content.question:
Consider the following code segment.

Which of the following describes the possible values of ans as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Any integer value from 1 to 8, inclusive
Any integer value from 1 to 16, inclusive
Any integer value from 4 to 8, inclusive
Any integer value from 7 to 16, inclusive

content.answer: Any integer value from 7 to 16, inclusive

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
